t: Revelation 2
To the Church in Ephesus

“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Ephesus*r write:*r These*rln are*r the*r words*r of*r him*r who*r holds*r the*r seven*r stars*r in*r his*r right*r hand*r and*r walks*r among*r the*r seven*r golden*r lampstands.*r

I*r know*r your*r deeds,*r your*r hard*r work*r and*r your*r perseverance.*r I*r know*r that*r you*r cannot*r tolerate*r wicked*r people,*r that*r you*r have*r tested*r those*r who*r claim*r to*r be*r apostles*r but*r are*r not,*r and*r have*r found*r them*r false.*r
You*r have*r persevered*r and*r have*r endured*r hardships*r for*r my*r name,*r and*r have*r not*r grown*r weary.*r
Yet*rln I*r hold*r this*r against*r you:*r You*r have*r forsaken*r the*r love*r you*r had*r at*r first.*r

Consider*r how*r far*r you*r have*r fallen!*r Repent*r and*r do*r the*r things*r you*r did*r at*r first.*r If*r you*r do*r not*r repent,*r I*r will*r come*r to*r you*r and*r remove*r your*r lampstand*r from*r its*r place.*r
But*r you*r have*r this*r in*r your*r favor:*r You*r hate*r the*r practices*r of*r the*r Nicolaitans,*r which*r I*r also*r hate.*r

Whoever*rln has*r ears,*r let*r them*r hear*r what*r the*r Spirit*r says*r to*r the*r churches.*r To*r the*r one*r who*r is*r victorious,*r I*r will*r give*r the*r right*r to*r eat*r from*r the*r tree*r of*r life,*r which*r is*r in*r the*r paradise*r of*r God.*r
To the Church in Smyrna
“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Smyrna*r write:*r These*rln are*r the*r words*r of*r him*r who*r is*r the*r First*r and*r the*r Last,*r who*r died*r and*r came*r to*r life*r again.*r

I*r know*r your*r afflictions*r and*r your*r poverty—yet*r you*r are*r rich!*r I*r know*r about*r the*r slander*r of*r those*r who*r say*r they*r are*r Jews*r and*r are*r not,*r but*r are*r a*r synagogue*r of*r Satan.*r

Do*r not*r be*r afraid*r of*r what*r you*r are*r about*r to*r suffer.*r I*r tell*r you,*r the*r devil*r will*r put*r some*r of*r you*r in*r prison*r to*r test*r you,*r and*r you*r will*r suffer*r persecution*r for*r ten*r days.*r Be*r faithful,*r even*r to*r the*r point*r of*r death,*r and*r I*r will*r give*r you*r life*r as*r your*r victor’s*r crown.*r
Whoever*rln has*r ears,*r let*r them*r hear*r what*r the*r Spirit*r says*r to*r the*r churches.*r The*r one*r who*r is*r victorious*r will*r not*r be*r hurt*r at*r all*r by*r the*r second*r death.*r
To the Church in Pergamum
“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Pergamum*r write:*r These*rln are*r the*r words*r of*r him*r who*r has*r the*r sharp,*r double-edged*r sword.*r

I*r know*r where*r you*r live—where*r Satan*r has*r his*r throne.*r Yet*r you*r remain*r true*r to*r my*r name.*r You*r did*r not*r renounce*r your*r faith*r in*r me,*r not*r even*r in*r the*r days*r of*r Antipas,*r my*r faithful*r witness,*r who*r was*r put*r to*r death*r in*r your*r city—where*r Satan*r lives.*r

Nevertheless,*rln I*r have*r a*r few*r things*r against*r you:*r There*r are*r some*r among*r you*r who*r hold*r to*r the*r teaching*r of*r Balaam,*r who*r taught*r Balak*r to*r entice*r the*r Israelites*r to*r sin*r so*r that*r they*r ate*r food*r sacrificed*r to*r idols*r and*r committed*r sexual*r immorality.*r
Likewise,*r you*r also*r have*r those*r who*r hold*r to*r the*r teaching*r of*r the*r Nicolaitans.*r
Repent*r therefore!*r Otherwise,*r I*r will*r soon*r come*r to*r you*r and*r will*r fight*r against*r them*r with*r the*r sword*r of*r my*r mouth.*r

Whoever*rln has*r ears,*r let*r them*r hear*r what*r the*r Spirit*r says*r to*r the*r churches.*r To*r the*r one*r who*r is*r victorious,*r I*r will*r give*r some*r of*r the*r hidden*r manna.*r I*r will*r also*r give*r that*r person*r a*r white*r stone*r with*r a*r new*r name*r written*r on*r it,*r known*r only*r to*r the*r one*r who*r receives*r it.*r
To the Church in Thyatira

“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Thyatira*r write:*r These*rln are*r the*r words*r of*r the*r Son*r of*r God,*r whose*r eyes*r are*r like*r blazing*r fire*r and*r whose*r feet*r are*r like*r burnished*r bronze.*r
I*r know*r your*r deeds,*r your*r love*r and*r faith,*r your*r service*r and*r perseverance,*r and*r that*r you*r are*r now*r doing*r more*r than*r you*r did*r at*r first.*r

Nevertheless,*rln I*r have*r this*r against*r you:*r You*r tolerate*r that*r woman*r Jezebel,*r who*r calls*r herself*r a*r prophet.*r By*r her*r teaching*r she*r misleads*r my*r servants*r into*r sexual*r immorality*r and*r the*r eating*r of*r food*r sacrificed*r to*r idols.*r
I*r have*r given*r her*r time*r to*r repent*r of*r her*r immorality,*r but*r she*r is*r unwilling.*r
So*r I*r will*r cast*r her*r on*r a*r bed*r of*r suffering,*r and*r I*r will*r make*r those*r who*r commit*r adultery*r with*r her*r suffer*r intensely,*r unless*r they*r repent*r of*r her*r ways.*r

I*r will*r strike*r her*r children*r dead.*r Then*r all*r the*r churches*r will*r know*r that*r I*r am*r he*r who*r searches*r hearts*r and*r minds,*r and*r I*r will*r repay*r each*r of*r you*r according*r to*r your*r deeds.*r

Now*rln I*r say*r to*r the*r rest*r of*r you*r in*r Thyatira,*r to*r you*r who*r do*r not*r hold*r to*r her*r teaching*r and*r have*r not*r learned*r Satan’s*r so-called*r deep*r secrets,*r ‘I*r will*r not*r impose*r any*r other*r burden*r on*r you,*r
except*r to*r hold*r on*r to*r what*r you*r have*r until*r I*r come.’*r
To*rln the*r one*r who*r is*r victorious*r and*r does*r my*r will*r to*r the*r end,*r I*r will*r give*r authority*r over*r the*r nations—*r
that*r one*r ‘will*r rule*r them*r with*r an*r iron*r scepter*r and*r will*r dash*r them*r to*r pieces*r like*r pottery’*r —just*r as*r I*r have*r received*r authority*r from*r my*r Father.*r
I*r will*r also*r give*r that*r one*r the*r morning*r star.*r
Whoever*r has*r ears,*r let*r them*r hear*r what*r the*r Spirit*r says*r to*r the*r churches.*r
